title: The 25 Best 'Succession' Characters With Bill Simmons and Joe House
description:
In honor of Season 3 of HBO's 'Succession', The Ringer's Bill Simmons is joined by Joe House to rank the 25 best characters from the show.

Host: Bill Simmons
Guest: Joe House
Producer: Kyle Crichton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
